marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.aerodynamics.drag(aircraft, pamb, tamb, mach, cz)[source]¶

Total aircraft drag with the assumption that the wing takes all the lift

marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.aerodynamics.high_lift(wing, hld_conf)[source]¶

# 0 =< hld_type =< 10 # 0 =< hld_conf =< 1 # Typically : hld_conf = 1 ==> cz_max_ld # : hld_conf = 0.1 to 0.5 ==> cz_max_to

Maximum lift to drag ratio
